alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 9:10PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Brevard County through 1000 PM EDT... At 909 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Melbourne, or over Melbourne, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Satellite Beach, Malabar, Indialantic, Camp Holly Fish Camp, Merritt Island, West Melbourne, Indian Harbour Beach, Melbourne Beach, South Patrick Shores, Grant-Valkaria, Suntree, Palm Shores, Melbourne Village, Eau Gallie, Melbourne Airport, June Park, Pineda and Spessard Holland Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
